tags.name: zui-breadcrumbs
tags.description: `<zui-breadcrumbs>` wrap around `<zui-breadcrumb>`, as many as needed. Please use default unnamed slot only, do not use `slot="first"`. ZuiBreadcrumbs logic will apply the appropriate slot="first" to the first `<zui-breadrcrumb>` slotted in. The slot="first" helps create the truncated ellipsis effect, if conditions for truncation are met.

attributes.name: show-all
attributes.description: Use this boolean attribute if you do not want to truncate any of your breadcrumbs, all will be visible.

attributes.name: visible-count
attributes.description: Value determines how many visible breadcrumbs can be seen before truncation. If not set defaults to 4.

properties.name: showAll
properties.description: Use this boolean attribute if you do not want to truncate any of your breadcrumbs, all will be visible.

properties.name: visibleCount
properties.description: Value determines how many visible breadcrumbs can be seen before truncation. If not set defaults to 4.

slots.description: Unnamed slot, that the child `<zui-breadcrumb>` elements should be passed into

tags.name: zui-breadcrumb
tags.description: `<zui-breadcrumb>`'s are passed as a direct descendant into a `<zui-breadcrumbs>` wrapper. `<zui-breadcrumb>` will accept and format correct styling for `<a>`'s, `<button>`'s and other slotted in elements. Choose your slotted in element based upon your use case needs. Typically if items can be opened in a new tab we suggest using an `<a>/code>.

attributes.name: expand-text
attributes.description: Apply attribute if you'd like to remove max character ellipsis on a single zui-breadcrumb

properties.name: expandText
properties.description: Apply attribute if you'd like to remove max character ellipsis on a single zui-breadcrumb
